title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```

```{r}
f1 <- function(df) {
  df %>%
    group_by(X3) %>%
    summarise(Time = sum(X7) / 3) %>%
    summarise(
    Max = max(Time),
    Min = min(Time),
    Mean = mean(Time),
    Stdv = sd(Time)
    )
}

f2 <- function(df) {
  df %>%
    group_by(X3, X8) %>%
    summarise(
    Mean = mean(X7),
    Min = min(X7),
    Max = max(X7),
    Stdv = sd(X7)
    )
}
```

```{r}
brightkite <-
  read_delim(file = "disabled_20180709-111833_nc_brightkite-count.csv",
  delim = ";",
  col_names = FALSE)
  
gowalla <-
  read_delim(file = "disabled_20180709-111833_nc_gowalla-count.csv",
  delim = ";",
  col_names = FALSE)
  
flights <-
  read_delim(file = "disabled_20180709-111833_nc_on_time_performance-count.csv",
  delim = ";",
  col_names = FALSE)
  
twitter <-
  read_delim(file = "disabled_20180709-111833_nc_twitter-small-count.csv",
  delim = ";",
  col_names = FALSE)
  
f1(brightkite)
f2(brightkite)

f1(gowalla)
f2(gowalla)

f1(flights)
f2(flights)

f1(twitter)
f2(twitter)
```

```{r}
df <- flights

df

df %>%
  group_by(X3) %>%
  summarise(Time = sum(X7) / 3) %>%
  filter(Time >= 40)
```
